column4: Hello. I wanted to play with editing the context menus when right clicking a specific file type. Does anyone know, is this a nautilus specific thing, or a gnome specific thing? I am completely inexperienced in gnome/linux development.

Check out https://help.ubuntu.com/community/NautilusScriptsHowto to make your own, there are also several Nautilus extension in apt to do things, like resize images with right-click, open as admin, etc...
awesome dude, thanks alot. Ill take a look
Also for specific type if you right click, you can choose props and Open with
